features.title: Why Choose
features.description: Professional architectural plans with instant download, comprehensive documentation, and unmatched quality standards.

quality.title: Professional Quality
quality.description: All plans are created by licensed architects and comply with international building codes and safety standards.

instant.title: Instant Download
instant.description: Get your plans immediately after purchase with secure digital delivery and lifetime access to updates.

documentation.title: Complete Documentation
documentation.description: Floor plans, elevations, sections, construction details, and material specifications all included.

support.title: Expert Support
support.description: 24/7 customer support and consultation with our team of experienced architects and designers.

awards.title: Award-Winning Designs
awards.description: Our plans have won multiple architectural awards and have been featured in leading design publications.

delivery.title: Fast Delivery
delivery.description: Most plans are delivered within minutes of purchase, with custom modifications available within 48 hours.

hero.title: Professional Architectural
hero.description: From premium architectural plans to 3D visualizations and building permits, we provide comprehensive services for all your construction and design needs.

coreServices.title: Our Core Services
coreServices.description: We specialize in three main areas that cover all aspects of architectural design and construction compliance.

architecturalPlans.title: Architectural Plans
architecturalPlans.description: Premium architectural plans designed by licensed professionals for residential and commercial projects.

buildingPermits.title: Building Permits & Certificates

additionalServices.title: Additional Services

designAwards.title: Design Awards Program
designAwards.description: Submit your projects for architectural design awards and recognition.

sustainableDesign.title: Sustainable Design

digitalLibrary.title: Digital Asset Library

fastTrack.title: Fast-Track Services
fastTrack.description: Expedited design and delivery for time-sensitive projects.

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance
